text.first: We are a production company for generating creative and commercial projects. Starting from the idea to its implementation on the screen. From one minute video to full-length pictures. Our own equipment, team and style.
text.secondary: The signature style of our work is in the individual approach to our customer. We create a unique idea and scenario filling it with the concept. We carry out complete pre-production, selecting the team on request. Then we create the best shooting process with confidence at every stage. And we bring the project to its final end – editing, color correction, sound design and the release.

text.first: We are a married couple of actors with many years of experience on camera. The couple who, craving for development, began to implement their ideas and creative projects on their own, in addition to their main work in the industry, and receive valuable feedback from the audience. Now – starting from the spring of 2022 we act as a director and a producer, being the founders of our own production company.
text.secondary: Having many successful commercial projects behind us, we don’t stop learning and trying new things, making every minute of the footage meaningful.

text.first: An actor’s portfolio is the fundamental working material when cooperating with casting directors, directors and an agent. After all, this is the only opportunity to see you on camera before meeting you in person.
text.secondary: provides packages with partial or full portfolios. We know the filmmaking market from the inside and know exactly what casting directors and directors pay attention to at the casting stage and we are willing to work with you personally on your presentation, confidence on camera and create high-quality material.

coursesPage.title: for actors
coursesPage.description: It is possible to implement a single selected service or several of them regardless of the ready-made packages provided below. For more information – leave a request and we will contact you.

card.5: – from the agreed works (scenes filmed with us + the actor’s materials)
card.9: from a movie/play – with the possibility of having a partner on camera
card.11: – forming images based on the tasks
card.13: – with the possibility of having a partner on camera
card.15: with a coach and acting instructor
card.20: It is done in our studio with a cameraman, movie camera and professional light
card.21: An acting coach works with the actor during the shooting
card.22: After shooting: editing/color correction, sound design of each video
card.23: Possibility of additional online/offline rehearsals before shooting
